title: CM&R Inc. Recalls Beef Stick Products due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, July 24, 2019 CM&R Inc., a St. Paul, Minn. establishment, is recalling approximately 25 pounds of ready-to-eat beef stick products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain milk, a...

impacted_products: Smoked & Uncured Maple Beef Snack Sticks
